short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the dataLayer and tc_vars objects on the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our tool is designed for individuals in web analytics. For those who need to analyze the dataLayer and tc vars for tools such as Tag Commander and Google Tag Manager, we offer this tool to enable you to conduct your research more efficiently and to be able to take screenshots more quickly.
